main.name: Justin Williams
main.bio: I am a Full-Stack web developer with over ten years of experience in primary and secondary education. Recently, I completed a full stack development program form the University of Richmond, and am up to date on the newest trends in JavaScript, MERN, and responsive web design. As an educator, I also pride myself on giving dynamic, engaging, presentations that effectively communicate technical concepts to a variety of audiences. My latest project was a PWA for summer camp staff in locations that lack ideal mobile connectivity. I am eager to use my experience as a teacher and my passion for programming to make your business more appealing to our user.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Certificate of Completion, Full-Stack Web Development
education.description: An intense 24-week program that weaves theory and application of web development from start to finish - full stack. Languages include: HTML, CSS3, Bootstrap, Responsive Design, JavaScript, jQuery, API, AJAX, Firebase, Java, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Handlebars, Database Theory, Bookshelf.js, MongoDB, MySQL, Command Line, and Git.
Focused on classes in Violin, Theory and Keyboard Skills.

work.title: High School Orchestra Director
work.description: Teach a full schedule of String Orchestra, Piano and AP Music Theory at Clover Hill High School

work.title: Music Director and Organist
work.description: Conduct Choir, Provide Service Music on Organ and Piano, Arrange music for special Sunday's
